data.title: TBR Pile of Doom
data.meta_description: Hello and welcome to my TBR Pile of Doom. This list consists of all* the speculative fiction books in my physical possession as well as digital copies, which are currently unread. I may go through and purge at some point but for now, this is the list I'm working off of. *except I have a…
